text:
@LindseyGrahamSC Wow.  Sounds like a tough day. You probably really understand suffering.   
Imagine how POC must feel over racism, bias, brutality  .... those who've lost family and friends to COVID-19 (over 120K dead now).... and those little children in cages - separated from their families.
